name: SprayCool
overview: SprayCool, Inc. develops and supplies electronics thermal management and environmental isolation enclosure products for military contracts and industrial customers for airborne, shipboard, and land based applications. It offers enclosures, including Multi Platform Enclosure that scale from 4-21 slots of 6U VME or cPCI cards with configurable power supplies, I/O panels, and backplanes for commercial or rugged electronics; sealed transit case solutions, such as transit case cooling kits that enable a sealed environment for commercial grade 19â€ rack mount products; and custom solutions, which include data rack solutions and fluid handling tools, as well as component cooling solutions for radar, power electronics, and high performance computing. The company also provides consulting services, such as thermal assessments, thermal strategy/product designs, SprayCool system integration, functional verification, facility design, project management, and advisory services, as well as implementation services, such as training, testing and diagnostics/monitoring, and customer support. SprayCool, Inc. offers its products through system integrators. The company serves the defense, aerospace, military, telecom, oil and gas exploration, automotive, semiconductor fabrication, and commercial markets in the United States. SprayCool, Inc. was formerly known as Isothermal Systems Research, Inc. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Liberty Lake, Washington.

funding_rounds.source_description: Spokane's SprayCool Restructures With $10M To Keep Hardware Cool
